title: Virginia Chadwyck-Healey on how to pick the right dress to wear now... and love forever
text:
I had a Eureka moment this week. In the great search for dresses that will work harder this winter season and which will, in my case, look good during and after pregnancy, I struck gold with two styles that should prove ideal for work, for family gatherings, conferences, Christmas parties and beyond. Pregnant or not, these two brands should be added to your list of 'Things to Google while watching the Strictly results show'.

I contacted London designer Anna Mason via email, partly because she is one of the most approachable designers in the business, but also because I knew she would understand what I was looking for instantly. This is the level of service she offers to all clients – whether...
description: I had a Eureka moment this week.
